WHERE CO_DT IS NULL AND CHKIN_NO = #{chkinNo}

FROM TB_RMSERVICE_ORDER INNER JOIN TB_RMSERVICE_DETAILS USING (RSOD_NO) INNER JOIN TB_RMSERVICE USING (RS_CD) WHERE CHKIN_NO = #{chkinNo}
